description: Secondary school pupils and teachers should wear face coverings when a two-metre distance is not possible.
title: Coronavirus: Face coverings advised in Republic of Ireland's secondary schools
title_page: Coronavirus: Face coverings advised in Republic of Ireland's secondary schools - BBC News
maintext: All recommendations published in the public health advice by the Irish education minister in July still apply in all schools, with the exception of the recommendations on face coverings which has been updated to reflect the latest research and expertise.
